name: Fail Blog, Memebase, Cheezburger -> Make Prettier
description: Just a few CSS codes to make the complete "I Can Has Cheezburger.com" site family more fun. Got rid of Ads, and not necessary things + better alignment!
additional_info:
2012.03.07
Fixed some numbers

2011.09.18
recommendations

2011.07.23
added - icanhascheezburgerafterdark.com

2011.07.03
removed .socmark_container

2011.06.22
added - failblogafterdark.org

2011.05.04
Removed a div which disabled clicking on links on the right side of page.


2011.03.30
v0.01 - Few changes, better background + Screenshots



2011.03.28
v0.01beta - Made it in 30 mins, so sorry if something is wrong, I'll try to fix any future "bugs" and hope I will be able to be up-to-date every time.

Style contains these domains from here: cheezburger.com/sites

css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
 @-moz-document
	domain(cheezburger.com) { #leaderboard, #ctl00_ctl00_floattop, [id^="footer"], #embedProfileBox {display:none !important;} }
 @-moz-document
	domain(icanhascheezburger.com),
	domain(icanhascheezburgerafterdark.com),
	domain(ihasahotdog.com),
	domain(dailysquee.com),
	domain(historiclols.cheezburger.com),
	domain(myfoodlooksfunny.com),
	domain(somuchpun.com),
	domain(roflrazzi.com),
	domain(totallylookslike.com),
	domain(musthavecute.com),
	domain(ifshoescouldkill.com),
	domain(itmademyday.com),
	domain(punditkitchen.com),
	domain(lovelylisting.com),
	domain(totsandgiggles.cheezburger.com),
	domain(wedinator.com),

	domain(failblog.org),
	domain(failblogafterdark.org),
	domain(failbook.failblog.org),
	domain(hackedirl.com),
	domain(poorlydressed.com),
	domain(learnfrommyfail.failblog.org),
	domain(engrishfunny.failblog.org),
	domain(thatwillbuffout.com),
	domain(work.failblog.org),
	domain(ugliesttattoos.com),
	domain(crazythingsparentssay.failblog.org),
	domain(upnextinsports.com),
	domain(thereifixedit.failblog.org),
	domain(allnighter.failblog.org),
	domain(chzsketchybunnies.wordpress.com),

	domain(memebase.com),
	domain(thisisphotobomb.com),
	domain(verydemotivational.com),
	domain(graphjam.com),
	domain(senorgif.com),
	domain(pictureisunrelated.com),
	domain(comixed.com),
	domain(derp.cheezburger.com),
	domain(artoftrolling.com),
	domain(intertuberecords.cheezburger.com),
	domain(chzemokid.wordpress.com),

	domain(thedailywh.at),
	domain(tdwgeeks.wordpress.com),
	domain(hawtness.com),

	domain(lolmart.com),

	domain(memebaseafterdark.com)

	  {
		#uvTab,
		.footer,
		#ad-sponsoredpost,
		
		
		.recommendations,
		#sidebar_scraper,
		#panemain,
		#leaderboard,
		#leader_container,
		#ctl00_ctl00_floattop,
		#floattop,
		#embedProfileBox,
		#headtext,
		.postsubtitle .label,
		.socmark_container,
		.socmarks.clearboth,
		.embed_holder,
		[id*="footer"],
		[id^="footer"],
		#sub_footer_wrapper,
		#likesites,
		#showfeature,
		[id^="pd_rating_holder"] > [id^="PDRTJS"],
		div[style="background: transparent;padding: 5px 0px;"],
		IMG[usemap^="#map"],
		/*:last-child > H2,*/
		.navigation > H3,
		.content-attribution,
		.templates,
		#featured-content-header,
		#showSlideInNotificationContainer,
		.post.instream.cf,
		#tf300,
		.btn-printondemand
			{display:none !important;}

        .tabSet {width: 910px!important; left:-165px!important; margin:auto!important;}
		#mainbody { width: 910px !important; margin:auto!important;}
		#body_wrapper {background:transparent !Important;}
		
		.new-content {width: 800px!important;margin:0 55px 0 55px!important;}
        [id^="post"] P {width:auto!important; text-align:center !important;}

	/*Memebase family buttons: Featured/Vote/Upload/Lol Builder are wider then others, remove /* and * / in the next line if you want to hide them.*/
		/*.tabSet {display:none !important;}*/
	  }
